page.title: 15Energy In Norton Area.
page.content: In our area everybody uses electricity. You can use it for cookers, fridges, freezers, washing machines, tumble driers, hi_fis, radios, televisions, lights, some toys, computers and video games, lawn mowers, drills, hedge trimmers,welders, grinders and some fires. When there is a power cut other means of energy are candles, paraffin lights and Calor gas heaters. In our area there are lots of pylons because we are near Buildwas Power Station. Some people have meters in their homes and the meter is read every quarter of the year. Other people have 50p slot meters, in which they have to keep putting 50p. Either way it gives electricity which has to be paid for.
